data.text: @HakimSamsudin @NewsBFM Fuck. Kau jangan buat aku dedor kimo

3. “However, this is not a decision under the Health Ministry,” she added.

The PWD registration falls under the Welfare Department, which is under the Women, Family and Community Development Ministry.

2. “Hence, if the Covid-19 long hauler is disabled and fulfils the criteria for certification as a PWD by a registered medical practitioner, he or she can be recognised as one," Hospital Sungai Buloh rehabilitation medicine department head Dr Akmal Hafizah Zamli told The Star.
